name: Wells Can Company Ltd
address: Wells Can Company Ltd, 8705 Government St, Burnaby, BC V3N 4G9

featured_reviews.review_id: Very helpful staff. Great customer service. Excellent product options. I always return here.
featured_reviews.review_text: Very helpful staff. Great customer service. Excellent product options. I always return here.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Been using Wells on and off for about a year, just because they're the closest place to us and it was convenient when we needed something day of. The service never impressed us, so we werent consistent.

But today we went in and saw that they have signs encouraging people to defy the mask mandate and not requiring them the enter. Unmasked employees didnt even stay 6 ft away from us, even though we clearly took many steps back when they entered out personal bubble. We felt extremely dissapointed and disrespected. We will not be returning and have already contacted Burnaby bylaw. We will make the slightly longer drive to Pinnacle Distributors from now on, since they're service has always been amazing!
featured_reviews.review_text:
Been using Wells on and off for about a year, just because they're the closest place to us and it was convenient when we needed something day of. The service never impressed us, so we werent consistent.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I started canning/ preserving during the pandemic. Wells Can has always been stocked with everything I needed. The selection available at this store is one of the best selections I have come across in my trips to many other local canning suppliers.

The staff here is always knowledgeable, polite and most of all...helpful.

I recently attended this business and noticed some new signage. I feel it is very important for all businesses to have the same approach as Wells Can has had to the "mandating" of vaccines/masks policy. I wear a mask, and that is my choice. Some people choose not to, and that is also OKAY. Thank you for being open minded, and supportive of my freedoms as a Canadian Citizen!

I will go out of my way to come here from now on.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback on how we are doing with our customer service.

featured_reviews.review_id: These guys were extremely helpful.   I purchased a pressure canner from them. Definitely will come back for some classes. Thanks for the help.
featured_reviews.review_text: These guys were extremely helpful.   I purchased a pressure canner from them. Definitely will come back for some classes. Thanks for the help.

featured_reviews.review_id: Very glad I found Wells Can Company. When searching for tins for my product, most of the results were US companies and I didn't want to deal with duties, taxes and border delays. Wells Can Company has just what I was looking for at reasonable prices. When I made a mistake with my order, they were very generous in fixing my error. Terrific customer service!
featured_reviews.review_text: Very glad I found Wells Can Company. When searching for tins for my product, most of the results were US companies and I didn't want to deal with duties, taxes and border delays. Wells Can Company has just what I was looking for at reasonable prices. When I made a mistake with my order, they were very generous in fixing my error. Terrific customer service!

featured_reviews.review_id: Not a good experience with Wells Can Company. I phoned and got a quote on some bee keeping equipment and was given a quote , I then increased the order amount and was given a better price based on the amount. I placed the order and when I got the invoice (which was after the shipment) it was more than quoted. After a couple phone calls and emails I was told that was the new pricing  and I was quoted on last years prices and nothing could be done. They took over from another company that gave very good service , not the same now.  They didn't even offer to meet half way .  Hope they don't treat all customers like this ? Murray

featured_reviews.review_id: Great company. I finally had a place I didn't feel harassed regarding my mask exemption. Nice to see companies that aren't illegally enforcing on behalf of government.
featured_reviews.review_text: Great company. I finally had a place I didn't feel harassed regarding my mask exemption. Nice to see companies that aren't illegally enforcing on behalf of government.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind words.  We appreciate your business and friendship.

featured_reviews.review_id: I asked Ron what I wanted he said I got it the price is not to expensive phone them first. First time there.
